question.title: Valid Palindrome III
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Valid Palindrome II", "titleSlug": "valid-palindrome-ii", "difficulty": "Easy", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Valid Palindrome IV", "titleSlug": "valid-palindrome-iv", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: Can you reduce this problem to a classic problem?
The problem is equivalent to finding any palindromic subsequence of length at least N-K where N is the length of the string.
Try to find the longest palindromic subsequence.
